name: Luffy Is The Man Who Will Be The Pirate King!!!
text: Main If your Leader is [Sanji], look at the top 3 cards of your deck, put 1 card into your hand and place the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: If your Leader is [Sanji], look at the top 3 cards of your deck, put 1 card into your hand and place the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order.
